db:abstract.db:para: The QDnsTextRecord class stores information about a DNS TXT record.

db:listitem.db:para: QDnsTextRecord is part of Network Programming APIshared

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: When performing a text lookup, zero or more records will be returned. Each record is represented by a QDnsTextRecord instance.
The meaning of the fields is defined in RFC 1035.

db:section.db:title: QDnsTextRecord::QDnsTextRecord()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty text record object.

db:section.db:title: QString QDnsTextRecord::name() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name for this text record.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] void QDnsTextRecord::swap(QDnsTextRecord &other)
db:section.db:para: Swaps this text record instance with other. This function is very fast and never fails.

db:section.db:title: quint32 QDnsTextRecord::timeToLive() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the duration in seconds for which this record is valid.

db:section.db:title: QList<QByteArray> QDnsTextRecord::values() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the values for this text record.

db:section.db:title: QDnsTextRecord &QDnsTextRecord::operator=(const QDnsTextRecord &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns the data of the other object to this record object, and returns a reference to it.
